mapper.sql: USER_NO, USER_ORGID, USER_NAME, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NICKNAME, USER_MOBILE, USER_PHONE, USER_MAIL, USER_QQ, USER_GRP_QQ, USER_TITLE, USER_SEX, USER_BIRTH, USER_AREA_CODE, USER_ADDRESS, USER_POST_CODE, USER_IS_LEADER, USER_EDU_LEVEL, USER_SUBJECT, USER_TYPE, USER_MARK, USER_REGTIME, USER_SCORE, USER_HISTORY_SCORE, USER_COIN, USER_GROUP_ID, USER_ONLINE, USER_LASTLOGIN, USER_ISACTIVATE, USER_FLAG, USER_JOB_CONTEXT
USER_INTRO, USER_HEAD, USER_TECH_DIRECT, USER_HOBBY, USER_TRAIN, USER_WORK_EXP, USER_PRO_EXPER, USER_EDU_BG, USER_HEAD_M, USER_HEAD_S, USER_MSG_CFG, USER_MAIL_CFG
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
,
from tp_user
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from tp_user
order by ${orderByClause}

select
,
,
from tp_user left join tp_org on USER_ORGID = ORG_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT UT_USER_NO, GROUP_CONCAT(TECH_TYPE_NAME) AS USER_TECHTYPE FROM tp_user_tech_type INNER JOIN tp_tech_type ON UT_TECHTYPE_ID = TECH_TYPE_ID GROUP BY UT_USER_NO ) AS utt ON UT_USER_NO = USER_NO
order by ${orderByClause}

select
,
,
from tp_user left join tp_org on USER_ORGID = ORG_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT UT_USER_NO, GROUP_CONCAT(TECH_TYPE_NAME) AS USER_TECHTYPE FROM tp_user_tech_type INNER JOIN tp_tech_type ON UT_TECHTYPE_ID = TECH_TYPE_ID GROUP BY UT_USER_NO ) AS utt ON UT_USER_NO = USER_NO where USER_NO = #{userNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tp_user
USER_NO = #{record.userNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_ORGID = #{record.userOrgid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_NAME = #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_PWD = #{record.userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NICKNAME = #{record.userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_MOBILE = #{record.userMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_PHONE = #{record.userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_MAIL = #{record.userMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_QQ = #{record.userQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_GRP_QQ = #{record.userGrpQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_TITLE = #{record.userTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_SEX = #{record.userSex,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_BIRTH = #{record.userBirth,jdbcType=DATE},
USER_AREA_CODE = #{record.userAreaCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_ADDRESS = #{record.userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_POST_CODE = #{record.userPostCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_IS_LEADER = #{record.userIsLeader,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_EDU_LEVEL = #{record.userEduLevel,jdbcType=CHAR},

USER_TYPE = #{record.userType,jdbcType=CHAR},

USER_REGTIME = #{record.userRegtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
USER_SCORE = #{record.userScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_HISTORY_SCORE = #{record.userHistoryScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_COIN = #{record.userCoin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_GROUP_ID = #{record.userGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_ONLINE = #{record.userOnline,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_LASTLOGIN = #{record.userLastlogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
USER_ISACTIVATE = #{record.userIsactivate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_FLAG = #{record.userFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_JOB_CONTEXT = #{record.userJobContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_INTRO = #{record.userIntro,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
USER_HEAD = #{record.userHead,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
USER_TECH_DIRECT = #{record.userTechDirect,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
USER_HOBBY = #{record.userHobby,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
USER_TRAIN = #{record.userTrain,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

USER_MSG_CFG = #{record.userMsgCfg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
USER_MAIL_CFG = #{record.userMailCfg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

update tp_user
USER_ORGID = #{userOrgid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_PWD = #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NICKNAME = #{userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_MOBILE = #{userMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_PHONE = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_MAIL = #{userMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_QQ = #{userQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_GRP_QQ = #{userGrpQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_TITLE = #{userTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_SEX = #{userSex,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_BIRTH = #{userBirth,jdbcType=DATE},
USER_AREA_CODE = #{userAreaCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_ADDRESS = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_POST_CODE = #{userPostCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_IS_LEADER = #{userIsLeader,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_EDU_LEVEL = #{userEduLevel,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_SUBJECT = #{userSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_TYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_MARK = #{userMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_REGTIME = #{userRegtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
USER_SCORE = #{userScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_HISTORY_SCORE = #{userHistoryScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_COIN = #{userCoin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_GROUP_ID = #{userGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_ONLINE = #{userOnline,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_LASTLOGIN = #{userLastlogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
USER_ISACTIVATE = #{userIsactivate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_FLAG = #{userFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_JOB_CONTEXT = #{userJobContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_INTRO = #{userIntro,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
USER_HEAD = #{userHead,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
USER_TECH_DIRECT = #{userTechDirect,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
USER_HOBBY = #{userHobby,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
USER_TRAIN = #{userTrain,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

USER_HEAD_S = #{userHeadS,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
USER_MSG_CFG = #{userMsgCfg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
USER_MAIL_CFG = #{userMailCfg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where USER_NO = #{userNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}

#{userHeadS,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, USER_MSG_CFG = #{userMsgCfg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, USER_MAIL_CFG = #{userMailCfg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where USER_NO = #{userNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tp_user set USER_ORGID = #{userOrgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_PWD = #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NICKNAME = #{userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_MOBILE = #{userMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_PHONE = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_MAIL = #{userMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_QQ = #{userQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_GRP_QQ = #{userGrpQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_TITLE = #{userTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_SEX = #{userSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_BIRTH = #{userBirth,jdbcType=DATE}, USER_AREA_CODE = #{userAreaCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_ADDRESS = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_POST_CODE = #{userPostCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_IS_LEADER = #{userIsLeader,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_EDU_LEVEL = #{userEduLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_SUBJECT = #{userSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_TYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_MARK = #{userMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_REGTIME = #{userRegtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USER_SCORE = #{userScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_HISTORY_SCORE = #{userHistoryScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_COIN = #{userCoin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_GROUP_ID = #{userGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_ONLINE = #{userOnline,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_LASTLOGIN = #{userLastlogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USER_ISACTIVATE = #{userIsactivate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_FLAG = #{userFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_JOB_CONTEXT = #{userJobContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where USER_NO = #{userNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select u.user_orgid from tp_user u where u.user_no = #{userNo}
select count(0) from tp_user where user_id = #{vUserId}
select u.user_name as userName,u.user_no as userNo from tp_user u where u.user_no not in (select ur.ur_user_id from tp_user_role ur)

select u.USER_NO,u.USER_ORGID,u.USER_NAME, u.USER_ID,u.USER_PWD,u.USER_NICKNAME, u.USER_MOBILE,u.USER_PHONE, u.USER_MAIL,u.USER_QQ,u.USER_GRP_QQ, u.USER_TITLE,u.USER_SEX,u.USER_BIRTH, u.USER_AREA_CODE,u.USER_ADDRESS, u.USER_POST_CODE,u.USER_IS_LEADER, u.USER_EDU_LEVEL,u.USER_SUBJECT, u.USER_TYPE,u.USER_MARK,u.USER_REGTIME from tp_user u left join tp_org o on u.USER_ORGID = o.ORG_ID left join tp_area a on u.USER_AREA_CODE = a.AREA_CODE where 1=1
and u.USER_NICKNAME like #{s_userNickname}
select USER_NO,USER_SEX from tp_user
select USER_NO,USER_EDU_LEVEL from tp_user
select USER_NO,USER_Type from tp_user
select AREA_CODE,AREA_NAME from tp_area
select org_id,org_name from tp_org

select
from tp_user where USER_ID=#{userName} and USER_PWD=#{userPwd}

SELECT USER_NO, IFNULL(USER_NICKNAME,USER_ID) AS USER_NAME, USER_HEAD, TECH_TYPE, RQA_COUNT, RQA_QUALITY FROM tp_user INNER JOIN ( SELECT UT_USER_NO, GROUP_CONCAT(TECH_TYPE_NAME) AS TECH_TYPE FROM tp_user_tech_type INNER JOIN tp_tech_type ON UT_TECHTYPE_ID = TECH_TYPE_ID WHERE FIND_IN_SET( UT_TECHTYPE_ID, getChildTechType (#{techType}) ) GROUP BY UT_USER_NO ) AS utt ON UT_USER_NO = USER_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT RQA_USER_NO, COUNT(0) AS RQA_COUNT, IFNULL( AVG(IFNULL(RQA_QUALITY, 0)), 0 ) AS RQA_QUALITY FROM tp_realtime_qa WHERE NOT RQA_USER_NO IS NULL GROUP BY RQA_USER_NO ) rqa ON RQA_USER_NO = USER_NO WHERE USER_ONLINE = 1
ORDER BY RQA_COUNT DESC, RQA_QUALITY DESC
ORDER BY RQA_QUALITY DESC, RQA_COUNT DESC

SELECT
FROM tp_user WHERE USER_NO IN ( SELECT SPEC_USER_NO FROM tp_spec_course )
